questions.question: What is a Credit Score?
questions.answer: A credit score is a 3-digit number that rates your creditworthiness. This rating varies from 300 to 900. You can maintain a high credit score by honouring your EMI on time.

questions.question: Who issues the Credit Score?
questions.answer: The credit score and credit report are calculated and provided by four credit bureaus in India, namely Equifax, CIBIL, CRIF, and Experian.
